basics.name: Aisylu Shakirova
basics.label: Frontend developer
basics.summary: I'm a frontend developer. I have a passion for accuracy and beauty and I try to bring it into my job.

work.summary: Development websystems, SPA and landing pages from zero to launch
highlights: Creating mockup;
Creating UI/UX design using Figma;
Frontend development using JavaScript and Vue.js;
Backend development  using Python framework Flask and SQLAlchemy
Using PostgreSQL.
JWT user auth
SendGrid integration
Sentry integration
Deployment to Heroku
Working with SEO tools and integration of SEO parameters into websites.

work.summary: Axiros - the German based technology leader in device management, TR-069, and IoT solutions for service providers, enterprises, and OEMs.
highlights: Development scripts for auto-configuration servers (ACS) using Python and testing it.
Development configuration for customer-premises equipment (CPE) and integration these devices with the company's system 'Support Portal Axiros' using the TR-069 protocol.
Creating Python utility for automation of CPE configuration process.
Writing custom scripts within the scope of integration tasks of the company's system 'Support Portal Axiros' with CPE.

work.summary: Development of landing pages on freelance. Studying Java programming language.

highlights: Website development, mainly landing pages and multi-page websites using CMS 1C-Bitrix (analogue of WordPress or Magenta).
Development adaptive and cross-browser layout using JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, Uikit, Less, Gulp and PHP.
Development of extraordinary and interesting animations, pixel perfect development, customization of current CMS components for realization clients needs.

work.summary: Design, supply, construction of industrial boilers and mini-CHP
highlights: Design of large and medium capacity boiler houses (up to 30 MW). Designing of power centres with GTU application.  Aerodynamic calculation of the gas-air tract of installations.
Selection of equipment, designing of the principal and design scheme, agreement with the customer, developing of schemes and drawings

Designing of heat networks: a selection of tracing, placement of fixed supports, the calculation for strength and stability; development of the circuit, a profile of the route, nodes and specifications, calculation of heat loss, the performance of the UDC system, etc

education.institution: Kazan Power Engineering University, Kazan, Russia
Kazan Power Engineering University, Kazan, Russia
